name: Supreme Athel
aura: Increase Ally ATK in Arena battles by 35

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. If there are any enemies under a [Freeze] debuff, also attacks them. 

Decreases the enemy’s ATK by 3% whenever this Champion hits an enemy with this skill (stacks up to 30%). 

Also increases this Champion’s ATK by 3% whenever they hit an enemy with this skill (stacks up to 30%).
skills.name: Exemplar of Stoicism
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Will ignore [Strengthen], [Ally Protection] and [Unkillable] buffs on enemies under a [Freeze] debuff. 

Then, has a 100% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Cold Company
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff, a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 3 turns, then grants an Extra Turn. The value of the [Shield] is proportional to this Champion’s ATK.
skills.name: Ever Faithful

skills.desc:
Has a 15% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff on attackers for 1 turn when hit while under a [Shield] buff. 

Has a 35% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn whenever a [Shield] buff on this Champion is removed by damage.
skills.name: Frosty Glare [P]
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
